testcase.classname: Reminder mobile app validation - Just Reminder
testcase.name: SimplestReminderApp app - operation type - add reminder
testcase.system-out: Given SimplestReminderApp User sets default mobile capability...............passed And SimplestReminderApp User sets Android mobile capability which is appPackage and appActivity.passed When SimplestReminderApp User starts app....................................passed Then SimplestReminderApp Home screen elements to be shown...................passed When SimplestReminderApp User adds reminder with default setting............passed Then SimplestReminderApp Same reminder should be shown in list..............passed And SimplestReminderApp User stops the app..................................passed

testcase.classname: Reminder mobile app validation - Just Reminder
testcase.name: SimplestReminderApp app - operation type - edit reminder
testcase.system-out: Given SimplestReminderApp User sets default mobile capability...............passed And SimplestReminderApp User sets Android mobile capability which is appPackage and appActivity.passed When SimplestReminderApp User starts app....................................passed Then SimplestReminderApp Home screen elements to be shown...................passed When SimplestReminderApp User edits already added reminder by changing text.passed Then SimplestReminderApp Edited reminder should be shown in list............passed And SimplestReminderApp User stops the app..................................passed

testcase.classname: Reminder mobile app validation - Just Reminder
testcase.name: SimplestReminderApp app - operation type - delete reminder
testcase.system-out: Given SimplestReminderApp User sets default mobile capability...............passed And SimplestReminderApp User sets Android mobile capability which is appPackage and appActivity.passed When SimplestReminderApp User starts app....................................passed Then SimplestReminderApp Home screen elements to be shown...................passed When SimplestReminderApp User deletes already added reminder by changing text.passed Then SimplestReminderApp Deleted reminder should not be shown in list.......passed And SimplestReminderApp User stops the app..................................passed
